9 namespace oxygine
10 {
11  class PostProcessOptions
12  {
13  public:
14  enum
15  {
16  flag_singleR2T = 1,
17  flag_fullscreen = 1 << 1,
18  flag_screen = 1 << 2,
19  flag_fixedBounds = 1 << 3,
20  };
21 
22  PostProcessOptions(int flags = 0) : _flags(flags), _downscale(1), _clearColor(0, 0, 0, 0) {}
23  PostProcessOptions& fullscreen(bool enable = true) { _flags = enable ? (_flags | flag_fullscreen) : (_flags & (~flag_fullscreen)); return *this; }
24  PostProcessOptions& singleRender(bool enable = true) { _flags = enable ? (_flags | flag_singleR2T) : (_flags & (~flag_singleR2T)); return *this; }
25  //loops -(2, 3, 4, ...), final size: 2^loops
26  PostProcessOptions& downscale(int loops = 2) { _downscale = loops; return *this; }
27  PostProcessOptions& clear(const Color& c) { _clearColor = c; return *this; }
28  PostProcessOptions& fixedBounds(const RectF& b) { _fixedBounds = b; _flags |= flag_fixedBounds; return *this; }
29 
30  int _flags;
31  int _downscale;
32  RectF _fixedBounds;
33  Color _clearColor;
34  };
